name: Clingy Squid
description:
Clingy Squid is made for Kenney Game Jam 2021 with the theme of "Rotation". 

So I made a flappy bird clone with a TWIST in 48 hours. This squid will gravitate toward the cursor.  Lead the squid to avoid the pipe for as long as possible!

Controls:

Squid will chase your cursor so lead the squid with that. The squid will slowly move toward your cursor while rotating with your cursor as its pivot point.

Press "Spacebar" to freeze the squid in place.
